mojo-core.name: mojo-core
mojo-core.description: created when the second parameter on `bind(property, listener)` is an object.

mojo-views.name: mojo-views

BindingTransformer.name: BindingTransformer
BindingTransformer.description: created when the second parameter on `bind(property, listener)` is an object.

BaseView.name: BaseView

StateView.name: StateView
StateView.description: States View. This is usually defined in `{ sections: { pages: { type: 'states'}} }`

Animator.name: Animator
Animator.description: Animator that makes changes to the UI state of the application. Prevents layout thrashing.

Application.name: Application

RegisteredClasses.name: RegisteredClasses
RegisteredClasses.description: Collection of registered classes that can be used throughout the mojo applicaiton (views/models).

SubindableObject.name: SubindableObject
SubindableObject.description: Allows you to inherit properties from a parent bindable.

classitems.description: Emitted when an item is inserted
classitems.name: insert

classitems.description: Emitted when an item is removed
classitems.name: remove

classitems.description: Emitted when items are replaced
classitems.name: replace

classitems.description: Resets the collection. Same as `source(value)`.
Sets / Gets source array
classitems.name: source

classitems.description: Returns the index of a value
classitems.name: indexOf

classitems.description: filters the collection
classitems.name: filter

classitems.description: Returns an object at the given index
classitems.name: at

classitems.description: forEach item
classitems.name: each

params.name: fn
params.description: function to call for each item

classitems.description: Pushes an item onto the collection
classitems.name: push

classitems.description: Unshifts an item onto the collection
classitems.name: unshift

classitems.description: Removes N Number of items
classitems.name: splice

classitems.description: Removes an item from the collection
classitems.name: remove

classitems.description: Removes an item from the end
classitems.name: pop

classitems.description: Removes an item from the beginning
classitems.name: shift

classitems.description: First item in the collection
classitems.name: first

classitems.description: length of the collection
classitems.name: length

classitems.description: True of the collection is empty
classitems.name: empty

classitems.description: Last item in the collection
classitems.name: last

classitems.description: adds a listener on the event emitter
classitems.name: on

classitems.description: removes an event emitter
classitems.name: off

classitems.description: adds a listener on the event emitter
classitems.name: once

classitems.description: emits an event
classitems.name: emit

classitems.description: removes all listeners
classitems.name: removeAllListeners

params.name: event
params.description: (optional) removes all listeners of `event`. Omitting will remove everything.

classitems.description:
Emitted when the bindable object is disposed. This happens
when the object is no-longer needed.
classitems.name: dispose

classitems.description: Emitted everytime a property changes
classitems.name: change

classitems.description: Emitted when a specific property changes
classitems.name: change:*

classitems.description: The context of the bindable object. Note that the context can be `this`.
classitems.name: context

classitems.description: Returns the keys in the context
classitems.name: keys

classitems.description: Returns TRUE if a property exists in the context
classitems.name: has

classitems.description: Returns a property stored in the bindable object context
classitems.name: get

params.name: path
params.description: path to the value. Can be something like `person.city.name`.

classitems.description: Properties to set on the bindable object
classitems.name: setProperties

classitems.description: Sets a property on the bindable object's context
classitems.name: set

params.name: path
params.description: path to the value. Can be something like `person.city.name`.

classitems.description: Binds a property to a function
classitems.name: bind

params.name: now
params.description: (optional) call binding now. Otherwise wait till property changes.

classitems.description: Disposes the bindable object. Emits `dispose`.
classitems.name: dispose

classitems.description: Converts the context to a JSON object
classitems.name: toJSON

classitems.description: the target bindable object
classitems.name: target

classitems.description: triggers the binding listener
classitems.name: now

classitems.description: disposes the binding
classitems.name: dispose

classitems.description: Called when the view is rendered
classitems.name: render

classitems.description: Called when the view is remove
classitems.name: remove

classitems.description: emitted when a property is being watched
classitems.name: watching

classitems.description: The main application that instantiated this view
classitems.name: application

classitems.description: adds a disposable object to cleanup when the view is destroyed.
classitems.name: disposable

classitems.description: Called when the view is instantiated
classitems.name: initialize

params.name: options
params.description: options passed when creating the view

classitems.description: Returns the path to the view
classitems.name: path

classitems.description: Renders the view
classitems.name: render

classitems.description: called in `render()`, before emitting `render` event
classitems.name: _render

classitems.description: Removes the view from the parent, or DOM
classitems.name: remove

classitems.description: jquery selector for elements owned by the view
Attaches the view to an element. This is mostly used for the main view.
classitems.name: attach

classitems.description: Sort of a mix-in for the view. This is how `sections`, and `events` are added.
classitems.name: decorate

classitems.description: Bubbles an event up to the root view
classitems.name: bubble

classitems.description: Number of items to asyncronously add to the list (optimization).
classitems.name: chunk

classitems.description: Delay between adding chunked items to the list (optimization).
classitems.name: delay

classitems.description: make sure decorations don't get activated for this view
The filter method for the list view
classitems.name: filter

classitems.description: The sort method for the list
classitems.name: sort

classitems.description: Maps model data before setting to the instantiated list item view
classitems.name: map

classitems.description: The size of the list view
classitems.name: length

classitems.description: The model view factory for creating each list item
classitems.name: modelViewFactory

classitems.description: The model view class for each list item. Use this or `modelViewFactory`.
classitems.name: modelViewClass

classitems.description: DEPRECATED
The collection of models to use. Each model is assigned as `model` to each instantiated `modelViewClass`.
classitems.name: source

classitems.description: prevent states from being decorated
Transitions from one state to another

params.name: from
params.description: view to transition from. This can be null.

classitems.description: current state name
classitems.name: currentName

classitems.description: current state index
classitems.name: index

classitems.description: TODO - change this to 'states'
The current view being displayed
classitems.name: currentView

classitems.description: The collection of view classes to use
classitems.name: views

classitems.description: Selects a specific index
classitems.name: select

classitems.description: moves to the next state
classitems.name: next

classitems.description: moves to the previous state
classitems.name: prev

classitems.description: moves to a specific state index
classitems.name: move

params.name: position
params.description: steps to move. Can be something like `-1`, or `1`.

classitems.description:
Runs animatable object on requestAnimationFrame. This gets
called whenever the UI state changes.
classitems.name: animate

classitems.description: The node factory to use. Changes depending on the platform.
classitems.name: nodeFactory

classitems.description: Where all the instantiated models live.
classitems.name: models

classitems.description: TRUE if testing mode

classitems.description: List of registered model classes

classitems.description: List of registered view classes
classitems.name: viewClasses

classitems.description: Plugins to use for the mojo application.
